description: Configure data-port (DP) network interface for DHCP. By default DP interfaces are static.

username.description: Username credentials to use for auth.

if_name.description: Name of the interface to configure.

create_default_route.description: Whether or not to add default route with router learned via DHCP.

password.description: Password credentials to use for auth.

ip_address.description: IP address (or hostname) of PAN-OS device being configured.
